I may not understand the set up well enough, but it seems like the registry on the build bots may be in a broken state. This message gets printed when the registry has been fetched via the pkg server so the local copy isn’t a repo, but Pkg is trying to update it via git
```��� Warning: Your registry may be outdated. We recommend that you run the following command: using Pkg; Pkg.Registry.rm("General"); Pkg.Registry.add("General")
��� @ Pkg.Registry /buildworker/worker/package_linux64/build/usr/share/julia/stdlib/v1.7/Pkg/src/Registry/Registry.jl:161```
<https://build.julialang.org/#/builders/71/builds/1806/steps/5/logs/stdio>
